nodes.text: Hylo Sortuli was a female Mirialan from Mirial who owned the pet lizard Bonebark. She was named after Hylo Visz, a millennia-old legend of the Mirialan people. Hylo Sortuli served under General Airen Cracken on Contruum and then took over as captain of the Shadow Raptor when they joined the Rebel Alliance. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the starship suffered a revolt from sabotaged droids, and she was captured by the T-series tactical droid TJ-11.
Hylo Sortuli appears in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game adventure Dead in the Water. According to how the players perform, Sortuli may be rescued or killed.
